design.layout: full-width with horizontal data table and filtering sidebar

typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, pool names in dark gray
typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif, medium contrast for secondary text
typography.dataStyle: Monospace or tabular numbers in right-aligned columns, green/neutral tone for APY percentages

components.description: Yellow top banner with domain verification alert
components.notable: High-contrast security alert with close button

components.description: SWAP, POOLS, POOL CREATION, DASHBOARD tabs
components.notable: POOLS tab active with blue underline

components.description: ALL 370, USD, BTC, ETH, CRVUSD, TRICRYPTO, CRYPTO, STABLE NG
components.notable: ALL 370 highlighted in blue, others outlined

components.description: Pool, Base vAPY, Rewards tAPR, Volume, TVL columns
components.notable: Pool icons on left, right-aligned numeric data, hoverable rows

components.description: Sort by Volume (desc)
components.notable: Paired with checkbox 'Hide very small pools'

design.visualHierarchy: Top banner draws attention first, header navigation establishes context, search and filters guide exploration, table dominates main space with icon+name on left anchoring each row
innovativeElements: Info icons (ⓘ) next to column headers for explainers
Token pair icons stacked in circular badges with overlapping design
Dynamic pool metrics updated in real-time (Daily Volume: $131.28m)

flow.userIntent: Explore liquidity pools, compare APY and TVL, select pool to deposit into
entryPoints: POOLS tab navigation from main header
exitPoints: POOL CREATION tab to add liquidity

interactiveElements.action: Filter pools by asset type (ALL, USD, BTC, ETH, etc.)
Find pools by token name or address
Reorder pools by Volume, TVL, or APY

flow.informationArchitecture: Pools listed in filterable/searchable table with key metrics (yield, rewards, volume, TVL) per row; token icons for quick visual identification; hierarchical sorting and filtering above content
frictionPoints: No obvious 'deposit' button per row—requires row click to proceed
Info icons (ⓘ) require hover/click to understand column meanings
Many numeric columns may be overwhelming for new users

microcopy.text: Always carefully check that your URL is https://www.curve.finance.

microcopy.purpose: Label for base annual percentage yield

design.layout: centered modal/card form overlaid on content

typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif 'Swap' centered in gray header bar
typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif for form labels, medium gray
typography.dataStyle: Large light gray numbers (0.00) in input areas, monospace for amounts

components.description: Yellow top banner with domain verification
components.notable: Persistent security alert

components.description: Swap form with Sell/Buy fields and token selectors
components.notable: Dark border/shadow creates modal emphasis, white background

components.description: Sell section with amount (0.00) and token selector (ETH)
components.notable: Light gray background, right-aligned token dropdown with icon

components.description: Vertical arrow icon (↑↓) between buy/sell sections
components.notable: Simple line icon, likely clickable to reverse trade

components.description: ETH and WETH buttons with icons
components.notable: Icon + label format, appears expanded showing options

components.description: Exchange rate, Price impact, Trade routed through, Slippage tolerance
components.notable: Dashes (-) indicate no values entered yet; slippage shows 0.10% with settings icon

components.description: Connect Wallet
components.notable: Blue background, disabled/blocked state until wallet connected

design.visualHierarchy: Modal card dominates, Swap heading centers attention, input fields guide top-to-bottom flow (Sell → arrow → Buy), metrics provide detail below, CTA button anchors bottom
innovativeElements: Minimal swap interface with token icon badges
Settings icon next to slippage for advanced options
Real-time metrics display (Exchange rate, Price impact)

flow.userIntent: Execute a token swap (ETH → WETH in this case)
entryPoints: Direct form pre-filled with token pair
exitPoints: Click swap arrow to reverse trade direction
Connect Wallet to proceed to transaction

interactiveElements.action: View or manually set amount to receive

flow.informationArchitecture: Two-step form (Sell section → Buy section) with real-time preview metrics below; token selector sidebars; settings access in footer metrics
frictionPoints: No wallet connected—CTA button is blocked
All metrics show dashes (no amounts entered) which may confuse new users
Token selector UI (checkbox next to icon) is minimal and may not be obvious

microcopy.purpose: Identify what token user is selling
Identify what token user is buying
Show user's tolerance for price movement

design.layout: full-width error page with centered content

components.description: Yellow top banner with domain verification
components.notable: Persistent security alert

components.description: Tab navigation and global controls
components.notable: Visible but not primary focus

components.description: Large '404' text
components.notable: Extra-large bold typography, grayscale background with llama/alpaca photo

components.description: 'Page Not Found' subtitle
components.notable: Smaller than code, centered, neutral tone

components.description: Three buttons: CONTINUE, GO TO HOMEPAGE, SUBMIT ERROR REPORT
components.notable: CONTINUE and GO TO HOMEPAGE are blue (primary), SUBMIT ERROR REPORT is dark/black (secondary)

design.visualHierarchy: Full-width background image creates dramatic entry, large 404 code dominates center, buttons anchored below provide clear escape routes
innovativeElements: Whimsical llama/alpaca background image for 404 page (brand personality)
Colored eyes/LED effect on animal character (playful detail)

flow.userIntent: Understand error and navigate away from broken page
exitPoints: SUBMIT ERROR REPORT link (error reporting form)

interactiveElements.action: Navigate back to previous page or refresh
Open form to report 404 error to support

flow.informationArchitecture: Error state with three escape routes: continue (undo), home (reset), or escalate (report)

typography.headingStyle: Large bold sans-serif, centered, minimal decoration
typography.bodyStyle: Medium-weight sans-serif for labels and microcopy
typography.dataStyle: Large monospace numbers (0.00) in light gray for input fields

components.description: Yellow banner at top warning about domain verification
components.notable: Prominent security-first messaging with icon and close button

components.description: Horizontal navigation with DEX, LLAMALEND, GOVERNANCE, BRIDGE sections plus user profile and wallet connect
components.notable: Blue CONNECT WALLET button positioned right, status metrics displayed inline

components.description: Central card with Sell/Buy input fields, token selectors with dropdowns, exchange details
components.notable: Vertical dual-input layout with exchange arrow icon between fields, dark border frame

components.description: Dropdown components showing ETH and WETH with icons and labels
components.notable: Token icon, symbol, and expandable dropdown arrows

components.description: Exchange rate, price impact, trade routing, and slippage tolerance display
components.notable: Settings icon next to slippage tolerance, dashes for unavailable data

design.visualHierarchy: Top warning critical, header navigation secondary, central swap card primary focus, metrics as tertiary context
innovativeElements: Domain verification warning positioned prominently to address phishing concerns
Live TVL/volume metrics in top bar showing protocol health at a glance
Token selector dropdown with icon and symbol pairing

flow.userIntent: Initiate a token swap transaction by selecting assets and reviewing exchange terms
exitPoints: Connect Wallet to proceed with transaction
Navigate to Pools, Dashboard, or other sections via header

interactiveElements.action: Select which tokens to swap between
Adjust slippage tolerance with gear icon

flow.informationArchitecture: Form-centric with inputs at top, helper text and settings below, action button at bottom
frictionPoints: Must connect wallet before executing any swap
No token amounts entered (shows 0.00), preventing preview of actual rates
Domain verification warning may distract from primary task

ctas.placement: Bottom of swap card, full width

emptyStateText: Connect wallet to view dashboard (shown on dashboard screen)

typography.headingStyle: Extra large bold sans-serif (120px+), black, centered

components.description: Yellow security warning at top about domain verification
components.notable: Close button on right, consistent with swap page

components.description: Branding, section tabs (SWAP, POOLS, POOL CREATION, DASHBOARD), user menu, network selector, wallet button
components.notable: DASHBOARD tab is active/highlighted, status metrics displayed right-aligned

components.description: Large centered area with rainbow gradient logo, 'Enter Curve' headline, call-to-action
components.notable: Animated-looking gradient logo above text, minimalist design

components.description: Three-column layout with Curve branding, Community links, Documentation links, Security links
components.notable: Colored icons (Twitter, Discord, etc.) for each link category, llama mascot illustration far right

design.visualHierarchy: Hero logo and headline dominate center, navigation secondary, footer links tertiary
innovativeElements: Hero page design uses radial gradient background pattern to create depth
Curve DAO mission statement in footer adds credibility and context
Footer organized into three semantic categories with icons for scannability

flow.userIntent: Connect wallet to access Curve dashboard and begin interacting with protocol
entryPoints: First visit to Curve when not authenticated
exitPoints: Navigate to SWAP, POOLS, POOL CREATION via tabs
Access external links (Twitter, Discord, Docs, etc.) via footer

interactiveElements.action: Switch between SWAP, POOLS, POOL CREATION, DASHBOARD
Navigate to external community, documentation, and security resources

flow.informationArchitecture: Hero-centric landing with prominent CTA, footer as secondary navigation and trust/resource links
frictionPoints: Requires wallet connection before accessing any dashboard features
No preview of what dashboard contains before connecting

copy.headline: Enter Curve

microcopy.text: Curve DAO is building the software and community to power the new web economy: decentralised, trustless, inclusive and autonomous.

trustSignals: Multiple community channels (Twitter, Discord, YouTube, Telegram variants)
Documentation resources (News, User Docs, Technical Docs, Github, Legal)
Security focus with Audits, Bug Bounty, Curve Monitor, CrvHub, Dune Analytics

flow.userIntent: Execute a token swap by inputting amounts and confirming token pairs
entryPoints: Click SWAP tab from any page
Direct URL navigation to swap interface
exitPoints: Click Connect Wallet to authenticate and proceed
Navigate to other sections via header tabs
Review and adjust token selections via dropdowns

interactiveElements.action: Enter amount of token to sell
View or enter amount of token to receive
Open dropdown to select different token to sell
Open dropdown to select different token to receive

flow.informationArchitecture: Form-driven with labeled inputs, exchange parameters, and authentication gate
frictionPoints: Empty state - no amounts entered means no rate preview
Multiple settings (exchange rate, price impact, routing) hidden until user enters amounts

ctas.placement: Full-width button at bottom of swap card

Domain verification warning as security measure
